product_name: CamelBak Marathoner Hydration Vest - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: With no aid stations on training days, who wants to plot their route around water fountains? This vest carries 2 liters of water, your phone, food and an extra layer for runs of 2 hrs. or more.
short_description: With no aid stations on training days, who wants to plot their route around water fountains? This vest carries 2 liters of water, your phone, food and an extra layer for runs of 2 hrs. or more.
